channel.title: Sea Slug quest

item.title: Sea Slug quest
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

xrune:

dialogue… but i could use a lil help, kinda a beginner, trying to figure out how to work everything still… maybe you could show me a few things… But i know these quests like the back of my head, done them so many times…

PM your msn.

Read full topic

item.title: Sea Slug quest
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“xrune, post:7, topic:489158”][quote author=yong min link=topic=607390.msg4229664#msg4229664 date=1361176342]
Nobody will ever have the complete game 100% replicated.
[/quote]

Your right, i plan on trying to complete these quests though… and see what happens… who knows… well jus get it as close as possible… and maybe your skills might come in handy… gotta do the quests a second time to get the blanks…[/quote]

You plan on completing this quests? Have you even got these in your source or are you only providing dialogue?

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: Sea Slug quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Why not instead of posting them here… use github and pull requests to the offical moparscape classic source. So that way they are actually used.

Dunno, im jus supplying information for the devs to use to create these quests… i have aLL the quests til legends done… Im trying to get some support going… i would like to see these implemented sometime soon…

Read full topic

item.title: Sea Slug quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::Sea Slug Quest:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Video:

NPC IDS for quest:
ID: 455 Caroline
ID: 456 Holgart
ID: 462 Platform fisherman
ID: 463 Platform fisherman
ID: 464 Platform fisherman
ID: 460 Bailey
ID: 461 Kennith
ID: 459 Kent

Item IDS for quest:
ID: 783 swamp tar
ID: 784 uncooked swamp paste
ID: 769 Seaslug
ID: 776 Damp sticks
ID: 778 Broken glass
ID: 777 Dry sticks
ID: 166 tinderbox
ID: 773 torch

Object IDs for quest:
ID: 124 loose panel
ID: 453 Fishing Crane
ID: 458 ladder (after u return from kents island ladder does damage)

Missing Objects:
ID: 454 rowboat
ID: 454 rowboat

Missing Information:
1)swamp paste “message” after you cook it
2) retalking to holgart “without” swamp paste
3)retalking to caroline after quest is complete
4)talking to holgart after u complete quest

Quest Notes:
0)Spawn: swamp tar in lumbridge
1)Spawn Caroline at coords: (X:522, Y:616)
2)spawn object: roatboat at coords (X:513, Y:614)
3)spawn seaslugs randomly on the fishing platform… fishing platform coords (X:494,y:616)
4)if you try and pick up a seaslug= (-6 hp from player) and:

sendmessage("you pick up the sea slug"); sendmessage("it sinks its teeth deep into your hand"); playerTalk("ouch!"); sendmessage("you drop the sea slug");
5)spawn damp sticks at coords: (X:488, y:609)
6)spawn broken glass at coords: (X:485, Y:614)
7)spawn bailey at coords: (x:483,y:618)
8)spawn kent at coords: (X:512,Y:639)
9)trying to climb up ladder after coming back from kents island:

sendmessage("You attempt to climb up the ladder"); sendmessage("the fishermen approach you"); sendmessage("and throw you back down the ladder"); playerTalk("ouch!"); --------------------player gets hit 8 hp!------------------
10)spawn object: roatboat at coords (X:515, Y:637)
11)Spawn Holgart at coords: (X:512, Y:638)

Part 1

Talking to Caroline:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello there");
	npcTalk("is there any chance you could help me?");
	playerTalk("what's wrong?");
	npcTalk("it's my husband, he works on a fishing platform");
	npcTalk("once a month he takes our son kennith out with him");
	npcTalk("they usually write to me regularly but i've heard nothing all week");
	npcTalk("it's very strange");
	playerTalk("maybe the post was lost!");
	npcTalk("maybe, but no one's heard from the other fishermen on the platform");
	npcTalk("their families are becoming quite concerned");
	npcTalk("is there any chance you could visit the platform and find out what's going on?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"i suppose so, how do i get there?", "i'm sorry i'm too busy"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		gethere();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		toobusy();
	}
}
	private void gethere() {
	npcTalk("that's very good of you traveller");
	npcTalk("my friend holgart will take you there");
	playerTalk("okay i'll go and see if they're ok");
	npcTalk("i will reward you for your time");
	npcTalk("and it'll give me a great piece of mind");
	npcTalk("to know kennith and my husband kent are safe");
	}
}
	private void toobusy() {
	npcTalk("thats a shame");
	playerTalk("bye");
	npcTalk("bye");
	}
}[/code]

Part 2

Retalking to Caroline after you accept her quest:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello caroline");
	npcTalk("brave adventurer have you any news about my son and his father?");
	playerTalk("i'm working on it now caroline");
	npcTalk("please bring them back safe and sound");
	playerTalk("i'll do my best");
	}
}[/code]

Part 3

Talking to holgart

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	npcTalk("hello m'hearty");
	playerTalk("i would like a ride on your boat to the fishing platform");
	npcTalk("i'm afraid it isn't sea worthy, it's full of holes");
	npcTalk("to fill the holes i'll need some swamp paste");
	playerTalk("swamp paste?");
	npcTalk("yes, swamp tar mixed with flour heated over a fire");
	playerTalk("where can i find swamp tar?");
	npcTalk("unfortunately the only supply of swamp tar is in the swamps below lumbridge");
	npcTalk("it's too far for an old man like me to travel");
	npcTalk("if you can make me some swamp paste i will give you a ride on my boat");
	playerTalk("i'll see what i can do");
	}
}[/code]

Part 4

Retalking to holgart “with” swamp paste:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello holgart");
	npcTalk("hello m'hearty");
	npcTalk("did you manage to make some swamp paste?");
	playerTalk("yes i have some here");
	sendmessage("you give holgart the swamp paste");
	----------------item swamp paste taken from inventory-----------------
	npcTalk("superb, this looks great");
	sendmessage("holgart smears the paste over the under side of his boat");
	npcTalk("that's done the job, now we can go");
	npcTalk("jump aboard");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"i'll come back later", "okay, lets do it"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		comelater();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		letsdoit();	
	}
}
	private void comelater() {
	npcTalk("okay then");
	npcTalk("i'll wait here for you");
	}
}
	private void letsdoit() {
	npcTalk("of course m'hearty");
	npcTalk("if that's what you want");
	sendmessage("you <a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=board' title='Click to Continue - Fast Free Converter' style=''>board</a> the small row boat");
	sendmessage("you arrive at the fishing platform");
	}
}[/code]

Part 5:

Talking to holgart “in ardougne” if you want to go back to trhe fishing platform:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello holgart");
	npcTalk("hello again land lover");
	npcTalk("there's some strange going's on, on that platform i tell you");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"will you take me there?", "i'm keeping away from there"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		takethere();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		keepaway();
	}
}
	private void takethere() {
	npcTalk("of course m'hearty");
	npcTalk("if that's what you want");
	sendmessage("you board the small row boat");
	sendmessage("you arrive at the fishing platform");
	}
}
	private void keepaway() {
	npcTalk("fair enough m'hearty");
	}
}[/code]

Part 6

Talking to Holgart on the fishing platform:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("holgart, something strange is going on here");
	npcTalk("you're telling me");
	npcTalk("none of the sailors seem to remember who i am");
	playerTalk("apparently kenniths father left for help a couple of days ago");
	npcTalk("that's a worry, no ones heard from him on shore");
	npcTalk("come on, we better go look for him");
	sendmessage("you board the row boat");
	sendmessage("you arrive on a small island");
	}
}[/code]

Part 7

Talking to Platform fisherman (lvl 30 purple shirt)

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello there");
	sendmessage("his eyes are fixated");
	sendmessage("starring at the sea");
	npcTalk("must find family");
	playerTalk("what?");
	npcTalk("soon we'll all be together");
	playerTalk("are you okay?");
	npcTalk("must find family");
	npcTalk("they're all under the blue");
	npcTalk("deep deep under the blue");
	playerTalk("ermm..i'll leave you to it then");
	}
}[/code]

Part 8

Talking to platform fisherman (lvl 30 yellow shirt red pants)

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	sendmessage("his eyes are fixated");
	sendmessage("starring at the sea");
	npcTalk("keep away human");
	npcTalk("leave or face the deep blue");
	playerTalk("pardon?");
	npcTalk("you'll end up in the blue");
	npcTalk("deep deep under the blue");
	}
}[/code]

Part 9

Talking Platform fisherman (pink pants white shirt)

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello there");
	sendmessage("his eyes are fixated");
	sendmessage("starring at the sea");
	npcTalk("must find family");
	playerTalk("what?");
	npcTalk("soon we'll all be together");
	playerTalk("are you okay?");
	npcTalk("must find family");
	npcTalk("they're all under the blue");
	npcTalk("deep deep under the blue");
	playerTalk("ermm..i'll leave you to it then");
	}
}[/code]

Part 10

Talking to bailey:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	npcTalk("well hello there");
	npcTalk("what are you doing here?");
	playerTalk("i'm trying to find out what happened to a boy named kennith");
	npcTalk("oh, you mean kent's son");
	npcTalk("he's around somewhere, probably hiding");
	playerTalk("hiding from what?");
	npcTalk("haven't you seen those things out there?");
	playerTalk("the sea slugs?");
	npcTalk("ever since we pulled up that haul something strange has been going on");
	npcTalk("the fishermen spend all day pulling in hauls of fish");
	npcTalk("only to throw back fish and keep those nasty sea slugs");
	npcTalk("what am i supposed to do with those?");
	npcTalk("i haven't figured out how to kill one yet");
	npcTalk("if i put them near the stove they squirm and jump away");
	playerTalk("i doubt they would taste too good");
	}
}[/code]

Part 11

Using damp sticks with broken glass:

	[code]sendmessage("you hold the glass to the sun");
	sendmessage("above the damp sticks");
	sendmessage("the glass acts like a lens");
	sendmessage("and drys the sticks out");
	---------------damp sticks are converted to dry sticks--------------[/code]

PArt 12

Rubbing dry sticks together

	[code]sendmessage("you rub together the dry sticks");
	sendmessage("The sticks catch alight");
	sendmessage("the sticks smoke momentarily then die out");[/code]

Part 13

Talking to kennith (2nd floor of fishing platform):

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("are you okay young one?");
	npcTalk("no i want my daddy");
	playerTalk("Where is your father?");
	npcTalk("he went to get help days ago");
	npcTalk("the nasty fishermen tried to throw me and daddy into the sea");
	npcTalk("so he told me to hide here");
	playerTalk("that's good advice");
	playerTalk("you stay here and i'll go try and find your father");
	}
}[/code]

Part 14

Retalking to kennith:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("are you okay?");
	npcTalk("i want to see daddy");
	playerTalk("i'm working on it");
	}
}[/code]

Part 15

trying to break loose panel:

	[code]sendmessage("you kick the loose panel");
	sendmessage("nothing interesting happens");[/code]

Part 16

Talking to kent on the small island:

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("oh thank Saradomin");
	npcTalk("i thought i would be left out here forever");
	playerTalk("your wife sent me out to find you and your boy");
	playerTalk("kennith's fine he's on the platform");
	npcTalk("i knew the row boat wasn't sea worthy");
	npcTalk("i couldn't risk bringing him along but you must get him off that platform");
	playerTalk("what's going on there?");
	npcTalk("five days ago we pulled in a huge catch");
	npcTalk("as well as fish we caught small slug like sea creatures, hundreds of them");
	npcTalk("that's when the fishermen began to act strange");
	npcTalk("it was the sea slugs, they attach themselves to your body");
	npcTalk("and somehow take over the mind of the carrier");
	npcTalk("i told Kennith to hide until i returned but i was washed up here");
	npcTalk("please go back and get my boy");
	npcTalk("you can send help for me later");
	npcTalk("traveler wait!");
	sendmessage("kent reaches behind your neck");
	sendmessage("slooop");
	sendmessage("he pulls a sea slug from under your top");
	npcTalk("a few more minutes and that thing would have full control your body");
	playerTalk("yuck..thanks kent");
	}
}[/code]

Part 17

Retalking to kent:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	npcTalk("oh my");
	npcTalk("i must get back to shore");
	}
}[/code]

Part 18

Talking to holgart on fishing platform upon returning from kents island:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("we had better get back to the platform");
	playerTalk("and see what's going on");
	npcTalk("you're right");
	npcTalk("it all sounds pretty creepy");
	sendmessage("you arrive back at the fishing platform");
	}
}[/code]

Part 19

Attempting to climb up ladder upon returning to save kennith on the fishing platform:

	[code]sendmessage("You attempt to climb up the ladder");
	sendmessage("the fishermen approach you");
	sendmessage("and throw you back down the ladder");
	playerTalk("ouch!");
	--------------------player gets hit 8 hp!------------------[/code]

Part 20

Retalking to bailey:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	npcTalk("oh thank god it's you");
	npcTalk("they've all gone mad i tell you");
	npcTalk("one of the fishermen tried to throw me into the sea");
	playerTalk("they're all being controlled by the sea slugs");
	npcTalk("i figured as much");
	playerTalk("i need to get kennith off this platform but i can't get past the fishermen");
	npcTalk("the sea slugs are scared of heat");
	npcTalk("i figured that out when i tried to cook them");
	npcTalk("here");
	sendmessage("bailey gives you a torch");
	----------------torch is taken in inventory---------------
	npcTalk("i doubt the fishermen will come near you if you can get this torch to light");
	npcTalk("the only problem is all the wood and flint is damp");
	npcTalk("i can't light a thing");
	}
}[/code]

Part 21

Rubbing dry sticks to start a fire for the torch to light:

	[code]sendmessage("you rub together the dry sticks");
	sendmessage("The sticks catch alight");
	sendmessage("you place the smouldering twigs to your torch");
	sendmessage("your torch light");[/code]

Part 22

Going up ladder with torch in inventory (cant go up ladder without torch):

	[code]sendmessage("You climb up the ladder");
	sendmessage("the fishermen seem afraid of your torch");[/code]

PArt 23

Retalking to kennith after you’ve gone up ladder:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello kennith");
	playerTalk("are you okay?");
	npcTalk("no i want my daddy");
	playerTalk("you'll be able to see him soon");
	playerTalk("first we need to get you back to land");
	playerTalk("come with me to the boat");
	npcTalk("no");
	playerTalk("what, why not?");
	npcTalk("i'm scared of those nasty sea slugs");
	npcTalk("i won't go near them");
	playerTalk("okay, you wait here and i'll figure another way to get you out");
	}
}[/code]

Part 24

Breaking loose panels quest stage:

	[code]sendmessage("you kick the loose panel");
	sendmessage("the wood is rotten and crumbles away");
	sendmessage("leaving an opening big enough for kennith to climb through");[/code]

Part 25

speaking to kennith after u break loose panels:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("kennith i've made an opening in the wall");
	playerTalk("you can come out there");
	npcTalk("are their any sea slugs on the other side?");
	playerTalk("not one");
	npcTalk("how will i get down stairs");
	playerTalk("i'll figure that out in a moment");
	npcTalk("okay, when you have i'll come out");
	}
}[/code]

Part 26

operating fishing crane:

	[code]sendmessage("you rotate the crane around");
	sendmessage("to the far platform");
	playerTalk("jump on kennith!");
	sendmessage("kennith comes out through the broken panel");
	sendmessage("he climbs onto the fishing net");
	sendmessage("you rotate the crane back around");
	sendmessage("and lower kennith to the row boat waiting below");[/code]

Part 27

talking to holgart after getting kennith down onto the row boat:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("did you get the kid back to shore?");
	npcTalk("yes, he's safe and sound with his parents");
	npcTalk("your turn to return to land now adventurer");
	playerTalk("looking forward to it");
	sendmessage("you board the small row boat");
	sendmessage("you arrive back on shore");[/code]

Part 28

Talking to Caroline Final:

	[code]public void run() {
	playerTalk("hello");
	npcTalk("brave adventurer you've returned");
	npcTalk("kennith told me about the strange going ons on the platform");
	npcTalk("i had no idea it was so serious");
	npcTalk("i could have lost my son and my husband if it wasn't for you");
	playerTalk("we found kent stranded on a island");
	npcTalk("yes, holgart told me and sent a rescue party out");	
	npcTalk("kent's back at home now, resting with kennith");
	npcTalk("i don't think he'll be doing any fishing for a while");
	npcTalk("here, take these oyster pearls as a reward");
	npcTalk("they're worth a fair bit");
	npcTalk("and can be used to make lethal crossbow bolts");
	sendmessage("You haved gained 1 quest point!");
	sendmessage("well done, you have completed the sea slug quest");
	playerTalk("thanks");
	npcTalk("thank you");
	npcTalk("take care of yourself adventurer");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
